org.apache.flink.api.java.operators

类 PartitionOperator<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<OUT>
      • org.apache.flink.api.java.operators.Operator<OUT,O>
        • org.apache.flink.api.java.operators.SingleInputOperator<T,T,PartitionOperator<T>>
          • org.apache.flink.api.java.operators.PartitionOperator<T>
  • 类型参数:
    T - The type of the data being partitioned.

    @Public
public class PartitionOperator<T>
extends SingleInputOperator<T,T,PartitionOperator<T>>
    This operator represents a partitioning.

    • 方法详细资料

      • withOrders

        @PublicEvolving
public PartitionOperator<T> withOrders(Order... orders)
        Sets the order of keys for range partitioning. NOTE: Only valid for PartitionOperatorBase.PartitionMethod.RANGE.
        参数:
        orders - array of orders for each specified partition key
        返回:
        The partitioneOperator with properly set orders for given keys

      • getCustomPartitioner

        @Internal
public Partitioner<?> getCustomPartitioner()
        Gets the custom partitioner from this partitioning.
        返回:
        The custom partitioner.

      • translateToDataFlow

        protected SingleInputOperator<?,T,?> translateToDataFlow(Operator<T> input)
        从类复制的说明: SingleInputOperator
        Translates this operation to a data flow operator of the common data flow API.
        指定者:
        translateToDataFlow 在类中 SingleInputOperator<T,T,PartitionOperator<T>>
        参数:
        input - The data flow operator that produces this operation's input data.
        返回:
        The translated data flow operator.
